title: System-Based Instructional Design Project: Application to Social Studies Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental elementary education curriculum concepts and foundational social studies knowledge
context.additional_context: Project analyzing and improving social studies instructional design systems in a smartphone-centric environment. Reinterpreting structural elements of elementary education settings (teacher-student interaction, educational media, etc.) from a systems perspective

learning_goals: Learners can analyze key components of an educational system (physical environment, social interaction, pedagogical methods, etc.) within a social studies context.
Applying a systems-based instructional design process, learners can create lesson plans for elementary social studies.
Learners can propose instructional design solutions using smartphone-centered interaction methods in resource-limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
